CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of Advocacy Actions taken by the Contact in the past 2 years (past 730 days). Rolled up Nightly by two DLRS Actions: 1. "Nightly Email Action in 2 Years" for Development Contacts 2. "Nightly Email Actions in 2 Years" for Email.
CustomField.label: Num of Advocacy Actions in Past 2 Years
